title: Spiced tuna patties with crushed black olives and spring onion flatbread
description: Making your own flatbread is very quick and a lot of fun, and goes great with this zingy fried tuna. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.
ingredients: 200g/7oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
3 spring onions, trimmed and finely sliced
200g/7oz bread, crusts removed, broken into small crumbs
2 spring onions, trimmed and very finely chopped
185g/6oz pitted black olives, very finely chopped, and crushed with the side of your knife to a paste
